description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A Puzzle Genre Game where you guide KC-001, a helpless robot, around a factory with various obstacles to overcome in order to release him from this industrial prison.  Move boxes, trigger switches, press buttons, and help KC escape.
description.short: A Puzzle Genre Game where you guide KC-001, a helpless robot, around a factory with various obstacles to overcome in order to release him from this industrial prison.  Move boxes, trigger switches, press buttons, and help KC escape.
